This Charles-Hubert Paris pocket watch comes with a lifetime movement warranty against manufacturing defects. Features include a 17 jewel mechanical movement, 50mm 14kt gold-plated hunter case, matching chain, skeleton dial with roman numerals, and a deluxe gift box.
